fields.text: Welcome to Zoosk, the leading online dating service connecting over 40 million singles worldwide with three million messages sent every day.
For account setup and login options, press [INDEX].
To create a new Zoosk account and start matching, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our account creation team.
To log in to your existing account, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to account support.
For help with messaging features or dating tips, press [INDEX].
For assistance with sending messages to your matches, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our messaging support team.
For advice on optimizing your profile and dating success, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our dating experts.
